price: እነዚያን በአላህ መንገድ የተገደሉትን ሙታን አድርገህ አትገምታቸው፡፡ በእርግጥ እነርሱ እጌታቸው ዘንድ ሕያዋን ናቸው፤ ይመገባሉ፡፡
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَمۡوَٰتَۢاۚ بَلۡ أَحۡيَآءٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ يُرۡزَقُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā taḥsabanna alladhīna qutilū fī sabīli al-lahi amwātan bal aḥyāon ʿinda rabbihim yur'zaqūna
